constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Erection of hip to gable and  side/rear dormer roof extensions incorporating 2 x roof lights to front roof slope to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The erection of hip to gable and side/rear dormer roof extensions incorporating 2 x roof lights to front roof slope to facilitate loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B, C and G of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
20 (Non-Road Mobile Machinery Register) - RBK Environmental Health Officer has reviewed the information provided and is satisfied this can now be approved.
Please amend the application form to show the correct site and return a copy to this office.Please note that the site location on application form (no.5) and the location plan (no.20) differ.
